Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Complete Vintage Poster Gallery application

- Full authentication system with NextAuth.js
- AI-powered poster analysis using Claude API
- Dashboard with search and statistics
- Upload system with drag-and-drop
- Poster detail pages with comprehensive analysis display
- Complete API routes for upload, analysis, and CRUD operations
- Database schema for PostgreSQL
- Vercel Blob Storage integration
- Team-based access control

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
